message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS

The paper deals with the problem of finding the most similar textual documents using Case-Based Reasoning (CBR) and investigates the performances of different similarity measures. This work is related to Information Retrieval (IR) and Computational Linguistics (CL) as it deals with textual data and Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques. It also involves machine learning algorithms, which are related to Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Learning (LG). Finally, the paper deals with similarity measures, which are related to Data Structures (DS). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.DS.
